title: Dangerous Playoffs teams, Belichick laughing, Raiders-Chargers rivalry, Bills HC Sean McDermott, Rams facing 49ers, and Dolphins DB Jason McCourty
itunes:title: Dangerous Playoffs teams, Belichick laughing, Raiders-Chargers rivalry, Bills HC Sean McDermott, Rams facing 49ers, and Dolphins DB Jason McCourty
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter start looking at playoff contenders and ask if the Cowboys or Eagles would be more dangerous in the postseason. Kyle doesn't trust the Cowboys and thinks the Eagles know who they are. The crew tries to figure out what Bill Belichick said to make everyone on his team laugh. The Chargers and Raiders close out the regular season on Sunday Night but could a tie benefit both teams? Bills HC Sean McDermott drops by to talk about his chance to close out the AFC East. Meanwhile, the Rams have the NFC West on the line as they face the 49ers, who could be without Jimmy Garoppolo. Dolphins DB Jason McCourty joins us for an update on his injury and a look at Miami's future.


The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
